title: EP 75: Killa Cali w/ Greg Kading
itunes:title: EP 75: Killa Cali w/ Greg Kading
description:
We sit down and conversate with former Los Angeles homicide detective and the author of Murder Rap: The Untold Story of the Biggie Smalls & Tupac Shakur Murder Investigations Greg Kading. We discuss the rash of murders through out the years in California, from the Tupac Shakur and Notorious B.I.G. homicides, to Nipsey Hussle and Pop Smoke.

We also discuss the tools that law enforcement utilizes to solve cases from paid informants to geo-fencing with cell phones and why the majority of murders are behind jealousy, revenge and woman,
